data.title: cocos2d-js editBox.touchDownAction is not function
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.11.1
- devices test on: Chrome Web browswer, Samsung Galaxy S5

Steps to Reproduce:
1. i want make the editbox is automatically be focus and open keyboard (in mobile device)
2. try method touchDownAction

var editBox = new cc.EditBox(...);

editBox.touchDownAction(editBox, cc.CONTROL_EVENT_TOUCH_UP_INSIDE);

it not work on Web browser

in mobile device show error message "editBox.touchDownAction is not function"

myLayer.setAnchorPoint(cc.p(1, 1));

it seem to be not working anyway

data.title: BUILD_SHARED_LIBS ON needs -fPIC
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.12 (stable)
- devices test on: Linux machine
- developing environments
  - NDK version: 12rb
  - Xcode version: None
  - VS version: None
  - brower type and version: Chrome 52

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Use such flags:

```
# libcocos2d
SET(BUILD_CPP_EMPTY_TEST OFF CACHE BOOL "turn off build cpp-empty-test")
SET(BUILD_CPP_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "turn off build cpp-tests")
SET(BUILD_LUA_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "turn off build lua related targets")
SET(BUILD_LUA_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build TestLua samples")
SET(BUILD_JS_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "turn off build js related targets")
SET(BUILD_JS_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build TestJS samples")
# Turn off not needed!
SET(USE_CHIPMUNK OFF CACHE BOOL "Use chipmunk for physics library")
SET(USE_BOX2D OFF CACHE BOOL "Use box2d for physics library")
SET(USE_BULLET OFF CACHE BOOL "Use bullet for physics3d library")
SET(USE_RECAST OFF CACHE BOOL "Use Recast for navigation mesh")
SET(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS ON CACHE BOOL "Build shared libraries")
SET(BUILD_EDITOR_SPINE OFF CACHE BOOL "Build editor support for spine")
SET(BUILD_EDITOR_COCOSTUDIO OFF CACHE BOOL "Build editor support for cocostudio")
SET(BUILD_EDITOR_COCOSBUILDER OFF CACHE BOOL "Build editor support for cocosbuilder")
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(${COCOS2D_ROOT})
```
1. Compile :)


PR with fix comming

data.title: possible memory leak when font size is 0
data.body:
When outWidth or outHeight is 0, new bitmap is allocated with 0 size.
And this bitmap will never be deallocated because FontAtlas::prepareLetterDefinitions just skip character which has 0 size.

data.title: Add missing class declaration and remove duplicate declaration
data.body: This PR adds a missing type declaration and header include for class `Quaternion`, it also removes a duplicate declaration of `Data` in `CCProperties.h`. Thanks!

data.title: #Improve XML parse performance with rapidxml pure SAX parser
data.body: This PR is will never break any compatible, and more easy to review.

data.title: [UserDefault-android] Return defaultValue parameter instead of some default value
Improving CCRef LEAK_DETECTION tool by making them thread safe. It i
data.body: s possible that ref's can be created and mutated off thread, and with leak detection on. This can cause ungaurded writes from two or more threads to a non-protected structure. Fixing a crash on iOS when using std::list instead of std::vector.

data.title: Random Crash At Launch - cocos2d::RenderState::StateBlock::setBlend(bool)
data.body:
Hello

We are getting this very rare crash at launch across many android devices and all android versions. This error has been occurring in all cocos2d-x versions v3.x including the latest one.  We tried everything to solve the crash but failed. We can cause the crash by rapidly closing and launching the app, crash occurs randomly.
## 

signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR), fault addr 00000010
#00  pc 00ae0c2c  ***/lib/libcocos2dcpp.so (cocos2d::RenderState::StateBlock::setBlend(bool))
#01  pc 00aee5dc  ***/lib/libcocos2dcpp.so
#02  pc 00a9e6d0  ***/lib/libcocos2dcpp.so (cocos2d::Director::setGLDefaultValues()+24)
#03  pc 00a9f824  **_/lib/libcocos2dcpp.so (cocos2d::Director::setOpenGLView(cocos2d::GLView_)+112)
#04  pc 009ef22b  ***/lib/libcocos2dcpp.so (Java_org_cocos2dx_lib_Cocos2dxRenderer_nativeInit+230)
## 
#00 -> /renderer/CCRenderState.cpp:732 -> _blendEnabled = enabled;
#01 -> /renderer/ccGLStateCache.cpp:120 -> RenderState::StateBlock::_defaultState->setBlend(true);
#02 -> /base/CCDirector.cpp:682
#04 -> /base/CCDirector.cpp:404
## 

Version:  cocos2d-x-3.12

The crash is caused by RenderState::StateBlock::_defaultState being nullptr. Other crashes happen if a control for nullptr is added for the crash line. 

Do you have any ideas about this problem?

Thanks

data.title: update cocos2d-console commit id : cocos package so change pyc
[ci skip] Remove LayerRGBA in scripts to avoid issues and update web ref
Copying the audio engine implementation for Windows to Linux
data.body:
The title says what this is about: I have copied the audio engine for Windows to Linux and made it work. I did this because the Windows implementation uses OpenAL instead of FMOD and
it was quite strange to me that Linux uses a proprietary audio library, while every other platform uses the open one. Also, I think that the audio engine is easier to maintain when every platform uses the same API.

I was surprised that this was such an easy job because I only needed to copy the source files, change every "Win32" to "Linux" and tell CMake to link against these libraries. I wonder why no one did this before. Anyway, why was the audio engine implemented with FMOD and not with OpenAL?

I also updated the installation script, but the deps-archive still contains FMOD. It would be really nice if someone could remove it when this get merged.

EDIT: The test failed since the dependencies for linux have changed.
